biography: Ernie and Lisa Haase make their home in Stow, Ohio, the foundation for both Signature Sound Quartet and StowTown Records. Ernie started his legendary quartet (EHSS) in 2003. Then in 2011, he helped begin the Southern Gospel record label StowTown Records along with good friend and fellow co-founder Wayne Haun. StowTown Records has become one of gospel music's fastest-rising labels that includes powerhouse groups like EHSS, Triumphant, and The Collingsworth Family.
name: Ernie Haase
